title: BRIEF-Sprott Announces ‍assets Under Management Were $7.3 Bln As In 2017, Versus $9.2 Bln In 2016
text: March 2, 2018 / 12:08 PM / in 27 minutes BRIEF-Sprott Announces ‍assets Under Management Were $7.3 Bln As In 2017, Versus $9.2 Bln In 2016 Reuters Staff March 2 (Reuters) - Sprott Inc: * SPROTT ANNOUNCES 2017 ANNUAL RESULTS * SPROTT INC - ‍ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT WERE $7.3 BILLION AS AT DEC 31, 2017, VERSUS $9.2 BILLION AS AT DEC 31, 2016​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
